dmca.title: [ABUSE] DCMA complaint]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2006 2:59 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; debra@alliance-link.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DCMA complaint]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DCMA complaint
Date:         Tue, 31 Jan 2006 15:57:01 -0500
From:         Debra/Alliance-Link <debra@alliance-link.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



This site, which according to the WHOIS, you are hosting, has my copy on it
page.

http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=33755&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xanersoft-exper
t-seo-company.com%2Flink-building.htm&t=1138740665&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.allian
ce-link.com%2Fcustom-link-building.htm&w=18&c
<http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=33755&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.xanersoft-expe
rt-seo-company.com%2Flink-building.htm&t=1138740665&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.allia
nce-link.com%2Fcustom-link-building.htm&w=18&c>=

I've used the copyscape.com tool to show you exactly what has been copied.

Please have it removed immediately.  You can check my site via Archive.org
to see that this text has been on my site for years.

I appreciate your help, thank you.

Debra Mastaler
Alliance-Link.com

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFD38+IvK/XpJs6oyURAh3BAKCffySL199fcb8NTp4N/ZfCMD6F2gCfdNFc
osmF8CEM1EmrOUKSO0s6iOw=
=IiNX
